3.0.6.en: SmileP1 package v 1.4.0. Updated icons and improved pairing screen.

4.0.0.en: Rewrite to SDK3 and Homey Compose. Fixed offPeak state after app restart. Fixed several 0-value bugs. Http timeout depending on poll time. package Smilep1@1.5.0. Ledring code updated. NL readme added.

4.1.0.en: Added support for Belgian P1 (reversed peak-offPeak). smilep1@1.6.1.

4.2.0.en: Fix tariff change flow trigger. Added filter unrealistic values option.

4.2.1.en: Fix flow start before capabilities update. Log tarrif change.

4.2.2.en: Changed internal FLOW code. Fix flow AND card for tariff sometimes incorrect.

4.2.3.en: Disabled Ledring on HP2023. Update smilep1@1.6.2.

4.3.0.en: Added 3-phase info (DSMR4+). Added configurable capabilities. Update smilep1@1.7.0.

5.0.0.en: Added 3-phase info (DSMR4+). Added configurable capabilities. Update smilep1@1.7.0.

5.1.0.en: Added Homey total imported/exported energy capability. Minor fixes.
